name: I'm Jonathan Garcia
description: My name is Jonathan Garcia and I am a Web developer.
my-description: I have been working on web designing and web development for 2 years. Constantly updating the technologies I already master, but also looking to learn new technologies to enrich my skills and improve my good practices as a developer.
design-info: Design of attractive interfaces for both web and mobile users, making the most of the brand or product that the client wishes to exploit on their website
development-info: Creation of well-structured web pages, good responsive design, attractive color palette, with interactions that give the user satisfaction when browsing the website.
marketing-info: Prepare a strategy and objectives for the promotion of the brand provided by the client, using the internet or other platforms to promote products and services of the brand in question.
maintenance-info: Complete maintenance of web pages to detect and solve errors, update content whether text, photos, web design elements, add new functions, etc.
seo-info: Web positioning through SEO, so your website appears in the main search results according to your business, both in Google, Bing, or other internet search engines
optimization-info: Complete optimization of your web page, improving loading speed, using optimized images, a good URL, to give a better experience to users who visit the website
about-info-1: In addition to my experience as a web developer and UX/UI designer, I focus on creating visually appealing, intuitive, and functional digital products. This involves mastering the latest trends in design and technology, as well as understanding user needs.
about-info-2: My passion for programming drives me to stay updated with the latest trends and technologies. I'm always exploring new tools and frameworks to enhance my workflow and product quality.
about-info-3: My experience as a freelancer has taught me the importance of communication and collaboration with clients. I'm accustomed to working in dynamic environments and adapting to the needs of each project, always aiming to exceed client expectations.
about-info-4: In summary, I'm a passionate and self-taught web developer and UX/UI designer committed to excellence in every project. I'm excited about the growth and learning opportunities that this constantly evolving industry offers.
about-skills-1: More than a year of professional experience in this language, allows me to perform without problems in the industry.
about-skills-2: More than a year of work experience in this language, I use it daily to develop web designs and interfaces.
about-skills-3: A year of experience using it in the front-end and back-end branch, allowed me to familiarize myself with the language, and include it in my work projects.
about-skills-4: One year using this preprocessor in the professional field, I include it in many of my projects since it allows me a better structured code.
about-skills-5: Less than a year using this framework, even so, I used it in countless work projects, which allowed me to get to know it for the most part.
about-skills-6: A year using this bookstore in the personal and work environment, it is one of the bookstores that I use and manipulate the most.
about-skills-7: More than a year using this JavaScript framework, carrying out multiple personal and work projects.
about-skills-8: It is the cross-platform runtime environment that I use to make my web applications scalable.
about-skills-9: It is a framework that I use mostly to be able to manage my APIs in the best way and my http execution model.
about-skills-10: I have experience with TypeScript, utilizing it to enhance the quality and security of my projects.
about-skills-11: I use Material UI for designing and implementing interfaces in my applications, leveraging its wide range of pre-defined components and styles.
about-certis-1: Bootcamp at Soy Henry, Full Stack Developer career where technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node, React, Redux, and SQL are learned.
about-certis-2: Period fulfilling the role of Teach Assistant at Soy Henry and receiving recognition and acknowledgment for ingenuity and imagination skills in soft skills.
about-certis-3: Promises, Generators, Object-Oriented, Fetch API, Async Await, Async JS, Objects, as well as consuming REST APIs, native JavaScript APIs like Notification API and Speech API.
about-certis-4: Web Development and Design: Creating a website in accordance with the teachings and practices outlined in the course, gaining knowledge of search engines and web libraries to apply to personal projects/ideas.
about-certis-5: Creating dynamic web pages with a focus on immediacy and basic elements of Javascript: Data, functions, variables, arrays, and objects, incorporating both basic and advanced operators, and the utilization of libraries and frameworks.
about-certis-6: Fundamentals and roles of UX design, User Experience Factors, Usability, Interaction Design (IXD), Information Architecture, Accessibility, Differences between CX and UX, Heuristic Principles, Low-Fidelity Prototyping.
about-certis-7: Web Accessibility Laws, Guidelines and Scope of Accessibility, Evaluation Tools, Web and Digital Product Validation, Best Practices for Enhancing UX, Applicative Principles in Accessibility.
about-certis-8: How to create a comprehensive budget, Types of pricing schedules, Calculating the cost of your Workday, Determining your hourly rate, Seniority: how it impacts the budget, What to charge and how, Avoiding errors and losses, How to obtain the cost per piece or design.
about-certis-9: Illustrator Fundamentals, navigating the interface and environment, exploring concepts of vector and bitmap images, filling and drawing techniques, vector graphics, transformation and distortion tools, images, and masks.
about-certis-10: Photoshop Fundamentals, Vector and Bitmap Images, Selection, tracing, and drawing, Manipulating color levels, curves, brightness, and contrast, Retouching and Advanced Editing Tools, Working with layers and color palettes.
services-questions-1: What is a responsive web page?
services-questions-p1: It is that page that is capable of adapting to any device where it is viewed, such as cell phones, tablets, laptops, without losing appearance or usability.
services-questions-2: What is a Domain and a Hosting?
services-questions-p2: Both are essential elements of a website. In short, the domain name is the address of the web page, while the hosting provides the space and resources necessary to launch the website.
services-questions-p3: Regular maintenance of your website allows you to attract and retain customers with new information, new products and services, in addition to helping you maintain or improve your ranking in Google.
services-questions-p4: You can pay online by credit or debit cards and payments by transfers.
projects-info-17-p1: Karku is an online platform that combines the presentation of ecological products with an online shopping system.
projects-info-17-p2: The project consists of two main parts: A presentation landing page and an eCommerce with advanced features. Karku eCommerce allows users to explore and purchase sustainable products online.
projects-info-16-p1: MDCX is an innovative cryptocurrency ecosystem.
projects-info-16-p2: Developed in WordPress with HTML, PHP, and CSS, MDCX represents a visionary initiative that aims to bridge the gap between technology and healthcare, fostering advancements in the pursuit of better global health.
projects-info-15-p1: The landing page is a campaign project designed to showcase an exclusive promotion of the MDCX token.
projects-info-15-p2: Developed in WordPress with CSS and HTML, the page provides a simple yet impactful interface to communicate the token's unique proposition and the benefits of participating in the promotion.
projects-info-14-p1: Cognity, the groundbreaking health application. With preventive disease plans and direct access to medical experts, Cognity offers a unique and dynamic approach to individualized health management.
projects-info-14-p2: The seamless integration of WordPress, CSS, and HTML empowers users to navigate through the platform effortlessly, ensuring a delightful and informative user experience.
projects-info-13-p1: The clinical simulator is a revolutionary tool specifically designed to provide doctors with the opportunity to test and enhance their knowledge in a virtual environment.
projects-info-13-p2: This paper explores the significance and versatility of clinical simulators in medical education and highlights the implementation of WordPress, HTML, and CSS for designing an effective simulation platform.
projects-info-12-p1: NABIJASH offers a tool for companies and students to connect securely and create professional relationships with great opportunities for growth, learning and much more.
projects-info-12-p2: NABIJASH is a full-stack application built using Typescript, CSS, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
projects-info-11-p1: Trilha lele is an e-commerce platform where you can find a wide variety of aromas and artisan products. It is a brand dedicated to decorating your home.
projects-info-11-p2: Developed in TiendaNube using own plugins, HTML and css styling.
projects-info-10-p1: Il Mirtilo is a family business, dedicated to the production, preparation and sale of gourmet quality products derived from red fruits harvested in our own plantations located in the town of Suipacha (Buenos Aires Province).
projects-info-10-p2: This e-commerce site was built using styling CSS and Tienda Nube´s plugins.
projectsApp-info-3-p1: The first final project of the Soy Henry Bootcamp is based on creating a Dogs SPA using an external API.
projectsApp-info-3-p2: Bringing that data we must do: style, paginate, filter and search. In my case, I used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Redux, Express, PostgreSQL and Node.js.
projectsApp-info-2-p1: Moon Ideas is a single page where you can view a clothing catalog.
projectsApp-info-2-p2: It features a search bar, filters, and cards displaying each product. It was developed and designed using Javascript, HTML5, and CSS3 technologies.
projectsApp-info-1-p1: Development of a Billing System with Barcode Integration, Filtering, and PDF Exportation, fully adapted to operate efficiently on mobile devices.
projectsApp-info-1-p2: Using ReactJS, ReactPDF, Quagga, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, the system ensures an optimal user experience in both functionality and design.
